answers.answer: Hello,You have not mentioned your gender, but if you are a female and you are having unprotected intercourse, so first would be to rule out any pregnancy since frequent urination is one of the earliest symptoms of pregnancy. I would suggest you to get your serum HCG levels estimated for that.The other causes are UTI, diabetes, diabetes insipidus, glomerulonephritis, pyelonephritis(inflammation of the kidneys),urinary tract infection, hypercalcemia, hypokalemia(low potassium),hyperthyroidism, hyperparathyroidism. In my opinion, investigations like urine examination, kidney functions, blood sugar levels, ultrasound lower abdomen , intravenous pyelography , thyroid function tests and cystoscopy may be needed to confirm a diagnosis. I sincerely advice you to consult a urologist or nephrologist and get yourself evaluated so that a confirmatory diagnosis can be made.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and regards.

question: i feel like peeing every second but when i sit to pee nth comes out only one two drops of pee but wnen i stand up i feel like peeing again..and it also burns when i that one to drop comes out..wht is wrong with me?
title: i feel like peeing all the time but there is no pee
